text: Alberto Bucci (25 May 1948 – 9 March 2019) was an Italian professional basketball coach. He was president of Virtus Bologna from 2016 to 2019. He won three Italian championships and four Italian Cups. Bucci was widely thought of as one of the greatest Italian coaches of all time. He was born in Bologna, Italy. Bucci died in Bologna from pancreatic cancer on 9 March 2019, aged 70.Alberto Bucci morto, Bologna piange il signore di BasketCityBasket in lutto, è morto Alberto Bucci ==References== ==Other websites== *Italian League Coach Profile Category:1948 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Bologna
title: Alberto Bucci
